description:
Spacious 1 Bedroom Apartment in the heart of the East Village. Walking distance from many restaurants and bars, as well as trendy neighborhoods Bowery, LES, Nolita & Soho. Citi bikes around the corner and multiple subway lines nearby ensure a great connection with the rest of the city!
Situated on the 2nd floor at the rear side of the building, the apartment is easily accessible, quiet and sunny. Well-equipped kitchen, large living room, separate bedroom and marble bathroom with great shower.
name: Spacious East Village Apartment
review: Charlotte's flat is wonderful, me and my boyfriend had the best stay during the Christmas holidays! It's perfectly located in the East Village with so many wonderful restaurants & cafes around, and it's not noisy (you can't hear the street or cars). I definitely recommend it and would stay here again next time. Thank you Charlotte for evething !
